009package imagingbook.common.mser.visualize;
010
011import java.util.ArrayList;
012import java.util.Collection;
013
014import ij.process.ByteProcessor;
015
016public abstract class Outlines {
017        
018        /**
019         * Collects the outlines of all foreground regions in the 
020         * given image as a collection of line segments ('crack edges').
021         * Note that line segments are not ordered.
022         *
023         * 
024         * @param bp a binary image (background = 0, foreground &gt; 0)
025         * @return an unordered collection of line segments
026         */
027        public static Collection<LineSegment2d> getCrackOutlines(ByteProcessor bp) {
028                Collection<LineSegment2d> lines = new ArrayList<>();
029                
030                int width = bp.getWidth();
031                int height = bp.getHeight();
032                
033                for (int u = 0; u < width; u++) {
034                        for (int v = 0; v < height; v++) {
035                                if (bp.get(u, v) > 0) {
036                                        if (bp.getPixel(u + 1, v) == 0) {
037                                                lines.add(new LineSegment2d(u + 1, v, u + 1, v + 1));
038                                        }
039                                        if (bp.getPixel(u, v - 1) == 0) {
040                                                lines.add(new LineSegment2d(u, v, u + 1, v));
041                                        }
042                                        if (bp.getPixel(u - 1, v) == 0) {
043                                                lines.add(new LineSegment2d(u, v + 1, u, v));
044                                        }
045                                        if (bp.getPixel(u, v + 1) == 0) {
046                                                lines.add(new LineSegment2d(u + 1, v + 1, u, v + 1));
047                                        }       
048                                }
049                        }
050                }
051                return lines;
052        }
053
054}
